   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to Wordle Buddy's documentation!
========================================

Wordle Buddy is a Python package to run the game Wordle in both free play and
manual mode.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   usage
